mapper.select:
select A.seq, A.user_seq, A.receive_seq, (select AA.nickname from users AA where A.user_seq = AA.seq) as user_nickname, (select AA.nickname from users AA where A.receive_seq = AA.seq) as receive_nickname, A.room_seq, A.title, A.content, A.is_complete, A.created_at, A.updated_at from todo A
A.is_delete = false
and A.room_seq = (select AA.room_seq from todo AA where AA.seq = #{seq})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todo( user_seq, receive_seq, room_seq, title, content ) VALUES ( #{user_seq}, #{receive_seq}, #{room_seq}, #{title}, #{content} )
